name: High School Prom Queen Date
description:
In this High School Prom Queen has got attention of many high school boys. Where almost all of the boys have crush on this cute prom queen and want to have a prom date. Everyday prom queen wants to look different and more charming with the amazing outfit and makeover.Let me tell you that how every girl can be a prom queen?

MAKE SURE YOU LOOK NICE …!!!

Use bit of makeup and wear nice clothes.Smile a lot, if you will look good, people around you will be happy.Do your hairs everyday.Wear some jewelry, but remember you do not look over because you are not a fashion model.

BE FRIENDLY TO EVERYONE IN SCHOOL …!!!

If people are mean to you , shake it off. Make people respect you, it will make you more powerful.You need to looks more good on special events of school.You will also wish that your boyfriend is also looking handsome to have some real crush on him.

BRUSH UP YOUR DANCING SKILLS …!!!

You gotta know how to take on the dancing floor.Practice will makes you perfect. You can practice on slow songs dance and fast songs dance.On the day of prom, wear your dress so you know how it feels when you are dancing.

FLIRT …!!!

You want to be the one everyone loves includes guys. If you have a boyfriend, though, don't flirt as you are already in a relationship.However you need to look as much good that everyone will love to flirt and will have crush on you.

FEATURES …!!!!

-> There is a Prom Queen contest , crush ,date and love stories
-> Prom Queen loves to go for shopping in supermarket with her boyfriend
-> Prom Queen loves to dance in the party with her boyfriend
-> Vote for your loved one prom queen
-> Dress Up and makeup the Prom queen and her boyfriend
-> Smooth and easy to play actions with exciting levels

Do not forget to play all of our other makeup, makeover, cooking, tailoring,school teacher, love crush,fitness gym, supermarket shopping, hip hop dancing, Ice Cream cooking,ballerina dance, babies and dress up games for girls and kids.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
